user_query: I'm planning a surprise birthday party for my best friend and I need some ideas for food and desserts. Suggest some chicken dishes, desserts, and pizza that would be perfect for the party.

TaskList.description: Gather ideas for chicken dishes suitable for a birthday party.
Gather ideas for desserts that would be suitable for a birthday party.
Gather ideas for various pizzas that would be perfect for a birthday party.
Compile all food and dessert ideas into a final list that can be used for the party.
